txt.en: TBD
Shoes for the Horses
Horseshoes might be found at the Edoras stables.\n\nLéofdag asked you to collect new horseshoes for the Riders' mounts.
Talk to Léofdag
TBD
Shoe Gesith
Shoe Hafoc
Collect horseshoes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Léofdag is concerned for the Riders' horses, for they have not had new shoes since they left the Wold.
'Thank you, [placeholder]...and I am sure the horses are grateful as well. When all of the preparations are complete, you should return to Burnoth.'
Brynmód shies away from you, wondering what you are attempting.
Flyting shies away from you, wondering what you are attempting.
Gesith allows you to shoe him.
Shoe Brynmód
Hafoc allows you to shoe him.
Collected horseshoes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gesith shies away from you, wondering what you are attempting.
Shoe Flyting
Brynmód allows you to shoe him.
Hafoc shies away from you, wondering what you are attempting.
TBD
Flyting allows you to shoe him.
'Have you shoed all of the horses?'

'[placeholder], it is good to see you again. We prepare to ride after Théoden King's army, but I am afraid our horses will not make the journey...they have not had new shoes since we left the Wold. Would you go to the stable and see if the army left any spare shoes behind?\n\n'If you find enough, bring them to the horses and fit them.'
Léofdag is in Edoras.\n\nYou should return to Léofdag and let him know that you have done as he requested.
Brynmód, Flyting, Gesith, and Hafoc -- the horses of the Riders Four -- are in Edoras.\n\nLéofdag asked you to fit the Riders' horses with the new shoes.
